articles.title: Resume
articles.contents:
EDUCATION
Mississippi State University, Adkerson School of Accountancy
Master of Professional Accountancy, expected graduation May 2022
Bachelor of Accountancy, May 2021
WORK EXPERIENCE
Graduate Teaching Assistant
Mississippi State University, Adkersen School of Accountancy, June 2021 - present
Assist in education and research operations throughout the accounting department
Aid professors in educational functions through class preparation, recording lectures, and proctoring exams
Help with professors’ research through data collection
Tax/Audit Intern
Dixon Hughes Goodman, Memphis, TN, January 2021 - March 2021
Worked on both tax and audit engagements and gained hands-on experience and knowledge in preparing tax returns and conducting audits for various entities
Learned and operated newly introduced tax and audit software programs while adapting to fully virtual environment
Acquired a more thorough understanding of public accounting services
Student Sales Worker
Mississippi State University, Mississippi Agricultural and Forestry Experiment Station Sales Store, May 2019 - May 2020
Answered customer inquiries through extensive product knowledge and kept organization of shipping and order information
Exercised interpersonal skills through prompt customer service
Quickly learned and mastered company database system
SKILLS
Microsoft Office
R Studio
ACTIVITIES AND INVOLVEMENT
Beta Alpha Psi, August 2019 - May 2021
Gained exposure to both local and top accounting firms and their services
Monthly tutoring to students in Financial and Managerial accounting classes
United Nations Association, September 2018 - December 2020
Founding member
Treasurer, April 2019 - May 2020
Spread advocacy and awareness of the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals
Head of fundraising and account management
